search_results.query: don't listen to a word i say

snippet.title: The Surprising Complexity of "Legen—wait for it—dary"
snippet.description:
Lexicon ValleyApr 16, 2014The Surprising Complexity of "Legen—wait for it—dary"
Of all the running gags on the recently ended How I Met Your Mother , Barney Stinson's catchphrase—" It's gonna be legen—wait for it—dary "—was...
By Rebecca Cohen
